title: it's time we Riot adds extra layer of security !
body:
It's 2017, and i'm shocked we yet to have had a extra layer of secruity method, either via mobile sms or authentictor etc. As someone who recently been hacked and luckily recovered it really shocks me that Riot/LoL has not done this yet when every other major game has multiple security layers =/ 

thoughts?

replies.body: Awesome that's what I really wanted to hear!

Two-step authentication is something [**we're working on**](http://www.riotgames.com/riot-games-security)! We want to make sure that all of the kinks are ironed out before we implement it, and there are no promises that it will come anytime soon, but rest assured that it's something we want in order to help protect our players further!
I agree. Instead of having a account recovery method that forces you to remember your first purchases, which most of us never do, why don't add 2 step auth like other major companies?
